firstSection.description: Issue digitized, standardized, and tamper-proof government documents and prompt eID & e-government services adoption
firstSection.title: Government

steps.description: Governments around the world are dedicated to digitalizing the public sector. However, they are encountering difficulties in promoting citizen eID adoption and digital inclusion in e-government services. These challenges stem from usability, interoperability, and security features in existing systems and processes
steps.title: Challenge

steps.description: Our end-to-end solution empowers authorities to issue tamper-proof Verifiable Credentials for various government documents, including national IDs, passports, driver's licenses, and business permits. These credentials are then securely shared to a citizen's ID Wallet, which gives them control over who can access their data and enables Single Sign-On authentication to access digital services both in the public and private sectors
steps.title: Solution
